content:
None of the "push code" post release tasks have been checked, but I assume that some of these have been done.
https://github.com/backdrop/backdrop-issues/issues/4275

Backdrop 1.15.0 Release checklist · Issue #4275 · backdrop/backdrop-issues
Scheduled for January 15, 2020 4:30pm PT Pre-release tasks Merge bug-fix commits @quicksketch Move all unfinished issues to the next bug-fix release milestone @jenlampton Draft Release notes @jenla...

We have an issue/PR that'll make it so that we no longer need to update the Tugboat repo everytime a new Backdrop version is released: https://github.com/backdrop-ops/backdrop-tugboat/issues/10

Remove Backdrop from repo · Issue #10 · backdrop-ops/backdrop-tugboat
Based on the discussion in #8 we want to try removing Backdrop from this repo so it's just the Tugboat directory and a README explaining things. Then we can setup Tugboat to download the latest...
